original_text: 向图灵奖得主Donald Knuth提问： 近日， Charles Leiserson, Al Aho, Jon Bentley等大神向Knuth提出了20个问题，内容包括TAOCP，P/NP问题，图灵机，逻辑，以及为什么大神不用电邮等等。看看Knuth有意思的解答：http://t.cn/Rv2ahar
text: 向图灵奖得主Donald Knuth提问： 近日， Charles Leiserson, Al Aho, Jon Bentley等大神向Knuth提出了20个问题，内容包括TAOCP，P/NP问题，图灵机，逻辑，以及为什么大神不用电邮等等。看看Knuth有意思的解答：http://t.cn/Rv2ahar

children.text: Knuth，神一般的存在，怀念他那套艺术著作～
children.name: Gu_HuaNan
中国计算机学会软件工程专委会
陈知雨-我名字被人占了

children.text: 问问TAOCP什么时候能出完吧。。。
children.name: 好奇心害死薛定谔的猫

children.text: "For a long time I've thought that an understanding of the way ant colonies are able to perform incredibly organized tasks might well be the key to an understanding of human cognition. Yet the ants that invade my house continually baffle me."
children.name: out-of-belieber

children.text: 2%[good] "Thus I came to believe that a small percentage of the world's population has somehow acquired a peculiar way of thinking, which I happen to share, and that such people happened to discover each other's existence after computer science had acquired its name."
children.name: 韧在百度

children.text: TAOCP还没照着机会拜读，太可惜了
children.name: 愤怒的雀斑NJU

children.text: 问:你的书不是写给每个人看的，但你是否觉得每个人都该学编程呢？答:general education is not my forte. somebody has to write books that aren't for dummies.I know my books aren't terribly easy to fathom; but I could have made them much, much harder.哇牛人bitchy起来就是帅
children.name: pocoapoco

children.text: 大神向天神提问，有意思😄
//网路冷眼: 大神向天神提问，有意思
学者的态度，对自己的著作了若指掌
children.name: 云飞alone
BianY_Y
网路冷眼

children.text: Donald Knuth：我为什么不用Email了？“对于人的一生来说，15年的电子邮件使用时间已经够长了。” 中文版链接 http://t.cn/8kvrjO7
children.name: plmpld

children.text: Charles Leiserson, Al Aho, Jon Bentley固然厉害，但是提问的人里面，算理论成就的话，毫无疑问最牛的应该是Tarjan，居然被放到等里面去了......
children.name: 张家浜河道玩航母

children.text: 我会问他怎样使用TAOCP，因为看完它们是不可能的。
children.name: 有用书生

children.text: 「I'm enormously happy that the work I did more than 30 years ago has miraculously survived many changes of technology,such as TeX, METAFONT and TAOCP, which helped to change the world 」各行业都是天才定标准和架构,类似普罗米修斯教会众人用火,然后俗人们围着琐碎混口饭吃打发时光[嘘]
children.name: 某冰

children.text: 为什么不问问王垠的吐槽[哈哈]
children.name: 张德园

children.text: 睡前先膜拜一下，大神向天神提问，明早起来细细学习。
children.name: 略呆萌的王叔叔

children.text: 大师真的值得学习，致敬。
children.name: 夏明武
盒子先生来自西伯利亚

children.text: theorem proving果然就三个字“说不准”
children.name: 张以弛

children.text: “Everybody seems to understand that astronomers do astronomy because astronomy is interesting. Why don't they understand that I do computer science because computer science is interesting? And that I'd do it regardless of whether or not it made money for anybody?”
children.name: 鬼蜮流风

children.text: I've gone through life refusing to go along with a crowd, and bucking trends with which I disagree
children.name: 高兴不起来的质数
当机器人遇到人工智能
当机器人遇到人工智能

children.text: 上帝发话了@爱新觉罗小牙
children.name: 坏坏的阳光狗

children.text: "I've never bothered to think about marketing, or about what might sell, except when my publishers ask me to answer questions as I'm doing now!"多实诚的老头子[哈哈]
children.name: 旺的平方根

children.text: 不得不赞一下威廉，每次都有这么多干货和爆料，而且还养分极高
Knuth居然喷了Tarjan，而且这么有理有据，好刺激
children.name: 唐平中THU

children.text: "By the way, the first person in history whom I'd classify as "100% geek" was Alan Turing. Many of his predecessors had strong symptoms of our disease, but he was totally infected."
children.name: turingfish博士后
吴怀宇_中国科学院

children.text: 老爷子那七步曲什么时候好啊 等着买全集。。。
children.name: chaochow

children.text: 第一个问题里说他喜欢实现Tarjan的强连通分量算法
真是学识渊博 连中国的数学家他都了解 下面的两个留言很有趣
children.name: forever_inside
digiter

children.text: 我也想问他为什么不用电邮。计算机科学界的伍迪艾伦吗哈哈~~
children.name: talentkeychen

children.text: 难得大神这么有空。”most people need to keep on top of things, but my role is to get to the bottom of things.“
children.name: Cruyff88

children.text: 提问题是创新的具体表现，聆听大师们的提问是思维升上另一种境界的催化剂
children.name: GraphTech-海忠Shi
